info: Rating, 4 stars,  · 5 days ago,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: a bit pricey for the space because there is not back up generator, there was some bedbug issues, and the water quality wasn't as good. there should be more mugs, cups, spoons in the space. Also there is no clocks in any of the rooms which was kind of odd to me. However, the bedroom, living space and dining space interior was very homey and welcoming. I got a little attached to the space when leaving because of how cozy it felt. The maid too was very kind and gets everything done on time!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Great host, and a great place to stay. We enjoyed our short stay here.

To be honest, the construction in front of the place went going on until 4 am(can't believe this). I found myself hard and difficult to sleep because of the noise and lighting coming through the windows. My eyes were sore as soon as I stepped inside the apartment because of the toxic chemicals of the painting which the host said they did a month ago. The address was wrong in the first place so you better check twice. I got lost in the banini at 2am and had to take the rikshar to get to this apartment. It's not banani, it's in gulshan niketon, which totally ruined my plan A. Overall, if I had been very well instructed regarding the exact hotel address and had there not been construction and had there not been toxic painting chemicals that hurt my eyes, It was not that bad.

It was a great stay in Green Homes. Owner Mr. Tarek is very friendly and helpful person. He’s always ready to help and made our stay comfortable.
I recommend this place to anyone who want stay in Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: It felt like being at home and offered great value for money too. It comfortably accommodates up to 6 people and is equipped with all the necessary kitchen essentials.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment:
The apartment was very good. I would give 10 stars if I could. Location wise it was walkable to Aarong Niketan and to many restaurants and markets.
The rooms were exactly as shown in the picture and the owner was very responsive. I would come and stay again at the same place if I visit to Dhaka.
Thank you Tareq ji. You have been a superb host.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Excellent place to Airbnb, full seamless execution, as promised, complete privacy, safe area. Definitely recommending to friends and family.
Loved the place, had everything you need and the guard is an amazing person to be around. Thank you for the experience
Found some difficulty to reach the place, however the place is very new and well maintained. The host is a nice person and helped with prompt responses.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: The communication with the host was excellent. They were responsive to my inquiries and provided helpful recommendations for local attractions and dining options. Upon arrival, I found the apartment to be clean, well-maintained, and accurately represented in the listing photos.

We wish to convey our utmost gratitude and thanks to the Management and all staff for the successful organizing of my family stay at your Airbnb. We were pleased with the Airbnb accommodation as it was very clean, tastefully furnished and well maintained. The rooms were spacious, well lit and hygienic. Most importantly, we were delighted by the readiness and the responsiveness of your staffs. They were always willing to accommodate whatever request we put forward. Such positive service attitude is highly commendable. Thanks for making our short stay so enjoyable, comfortable and memorable. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.
